Literature.Title: Scolopendin 2, a cationic antimicrobial peptide from centipede, and its membrane-active mechanism.
Literature.Author: Lee H, Hwang JS, Lee J, Kim JI, Lee DG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7 ATCC 43895(MIC=6.3µM),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 19430(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1(MIC=6.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 2(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=6.3µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=12.5µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=6.3µM),Trichophyton rubrum KCTC 6345(MIC=6.3µM)
